mapper.insert: insert into ecs_virtual_goods_card (card_id, goods_id, card_sn, add_date, end_date, is_saled, order_sn, is_verification, supplier_id, buy_date) values (#{cardId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cardSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addDate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{endDate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isSaled,jdbcType=BIT}, #{orderSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isVerification,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{supplierId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{buyDate,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update ecs_virtual_goods_card set goods_id = #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, card_sn = #{cardSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, add_date = #{addDate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, end_date = #{endDate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_saled = #{isSaled,jdbcType=BIT}, order_sn = #{orderSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_verification = #{isVerification,jdbcType=INTEGER}, supplier_id = #{supplierId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, buy_date = #{buyDate,jdbcType=INTEGER} where card_id = #{cardId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select card_id, goods_id, card_sn, add_date, end_date, is_saled, order_sn, is_verification, supplier_id, buy_date from ecs_virtual_goods_card where card_id = #{cardId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
